https://www.crunchbase.com/organization/importio

Import.io is on a mission to enable the worldâ€™s data. We deliver a SaaS product that enables users to convert the mass of data on web sites into structured, machine readable data. Our highly efficient and scalable platform allows customers to process thousands of URLs concurrently or on a schedule and gain access to millions of rows of data that they use for hundreds of different use cases.
